page.title: 10THE SHEEP INDUSTRY.
page.content: Approx.{3700}sheep in survey area. Mainly Horned Sheep _ Dalesbred & Swaledale. Expected lambing yield{100 _ 125%} Rams used _Dalesbred _produce_( pure _Swaledale _ " replacement) " _Teeswater _ " Masham Lamb "_Bluefaced Leicester_ " Mule " " _ Suffock _ " Suffock X " {1985}Approx.Prices from Lamb Sales. Masham male{Â£36} _ female{Â£45/50}each Mule " {Â£35} _ " {Â£55/60 } " Suffock male & female {Â£32/35} {2}famers sell off Draft Ewes(sheep they have finished breeding from other famers buy to continue breeding with) Compete at Leyburn Auction Mart for The Alf Suttill Challange Trophy for the Best 10 Dalesbred Ewes,neither successful but Mr.Bostock from Gammersgill awarded{2nd}prize selling his pen for{Â£77}each.
